mapper.select: SELECT post_id AS postId, post_type AS postType, category AS category, title AS title, content AS content, writer_id AS writerId, writer_type AS writerType, branch_id AS branchId, display_start AS displayStart, display_end AS displayEnd, is_visible AS isVisible, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM community_post WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND post_type = 'FAQ'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community_post ( post_type, category, title, content, writer_id, writer_type, branch_id, display_start, display_end, is_visible ) VALUES ( 'FAQ', #{category}, #{title}, #{content}, COALESCE(#{writerId}, 'SYSTEM_ADMIN'), #{writerType}, #{branchId}, #{displayStart}, #{displayEnd}, #{isVisible} )
mapper.update: UPDATE community_post SET category = #{category}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, branch_id = #{branchId}, display_start = #{displayStart}, display_end = #{displayEnd}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND post_type = 'FAQ'
UPDATE community_post SET is_visible = #{visible}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND post_type = 'FAQ'
